Text.Page:
{@LinkCreature:230#3026#Lilis}, up at the {@Rgn:9017001$$Lighthouse of the Sun}, can't get around one of the golems inside.

Care to help out?

, the {@LinkCreature:417#2001#old keeper} near the top of the tower won't let me near the igniter, and it needs cleaning or it'll break down again.

Find it and shut it down.

Thanks.

The tower's unstable enough when I can keep it clean!
